mapper.select: SELECT pk_period, SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='big' THEN bet_money END) as bet_big, SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='little' THEN bet_money END) as bet_little, SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='odd' THEN bet_money END) as bet_odd, SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='even' THEN bet_money END) as bet_even, SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='1' THEN bet_money END) as 'bet_1', SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='2' THEN bet_money END) as 'bet_2', SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='3' THEN bet_money END) as 'bet_3', SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='4' THEN bet_money END) as 'bet_4', SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='5' THEN bet_money END) as 'bet_5', SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='6' THEN bet_money END) as 'bet_6', SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='7' THEN bet_money END) as 'bet_7', SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='8' THEN bet_money END) as 'bet_8', SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='9' THEN bet_money END) as 'bet_9', SUM( CASE WHEN bet_item='10' THEN bet_money END) as 'bet_10' FROM game_saigou_bet where pk_period="${pk_period}" group by pk_period
select count(a.pk_bet) from game_saigou_bet a left join game_saigou_period b on a.pk_period = b.pk_period left join sm_user c on a.pk_user = c.pk_user

select a.*,b.period_CODE,c.user_code from game_saigou_bet a left join game_saigou_period b on a.pk_period = b.pk_period left join sm_user c on a.pk_user = c.pk_user
order by ${orderColumnName} ${orderDir} limit #{start},#{length}
